_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: TeamSpeak 6 Server (Beta)
author: kerbo@kerbo.tv
description: TeamSpeak 6 Server (Beta) using the official Docker image. Requires a writable mount to /var/tsserver.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
set -e

echo "TS6 runs from the official Docker image." 
echo "IMPORTANT: You must mount a writable volume to /var/tsserver (logs/data)."

variables.name: TS6 License Acceptance
variables.description: Set to 'accept' to accept the license (required to start) or 'view' to print the license to console.

variables.name: File Transfer Port
variables.description: TCP port for file transfers. Create an additional allocation for this port (default: 30033/tcp).

variables.name: Query Port (raw)
variables.description: TCP ServerQuery port (raw). Create an additional allocation if you want it (default: 10011/tcp).

variables.name: Query SSH Port
variables.description: TCP ServerQuery over SSH port. Additional allocation needed (default: 10022/tcp).

variables.name: Query HTTP Port
variables.description: TCP ServerQuery over HTTP port. Additional allocation needed (default: 10080/tcp).
